ing: 1 (10 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1/2 cup roasted red peppers, drained and chopped
des: "This recipe is perfect for Christmas or any holiday with the red and green vegetables. Goes great with any vegetable tray, or use it for chips or wraps."
ins: In a bowl, mix the cream cheese, ranch dressing mix, artichoke hearts, roasted red peppers, and parsley. Chill 4 hours in the refrigerator before serving.
